issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The current splash screen in the resources folder is for the screen size of the Z10 device i.e 600x1024.
The splash screen for the Q10 device screen size should be added too & the current splash screen appears stretched & compressed
fields.summary: BlackBerry Q10 : Include BlackBerry Q10 screen sized splash screen in the resources folder
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.1.201304122013
Ti BB SDK : 3.2.0.v20130412191647
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 
Win 8
Q10 Simulator : 10.1.0.1020 
Q10 Dev alpha C device running 10.1.0.138

comments.body:
Since having this work on 10.1 and 10.0.9 is not yet supported, we should hold off until 10.1 support is available on all devices. The following is a note from BlackBerry:

"The static asset selector is a built-in feature in 10.1 that will pick the asset (image, QML file etc) based on the folder hierarchy for different resolutions and themes. Weâ€™ve got this detailed out on this and its surrounding pages:
https://developer.blackberry.com/cascades/documentation/ui/resolution/using_static_asset.html"
